eng_after: is proven to be a liar
then you can return it to him.

eng_word: And after they had investigated thoroughly,

eng_after: So the LORD put him to death
and leave it as an inheritance
and He has given us rest

eng_before: and He has given us rest

eng_after: I have sent you as exiles.

but I will hold the watchman
